website_summaries.verdict: If you want a traditional energy drink that is low in calories and carbs, this is a great option.
pros: The popular Rockstar formula, only with zero carbs and no sugar
cons: Low calorie and zero carbs, but expensive
One whole flavor, so you'd better love it

customer_reviews.title: horrible delivery
customer_reviews.text: Box was delivered completely shredded and cans were all busted. This is the second time this has happened with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Taste great yet too much variability in the price
customer_reviews.text: Taste great yet with the large amount of caffeine, there is a huge rebound fatigue that sets in shortly after. Also it’s interesting that you can buy these for $31 one day and a month later they are $39, then $45 the following day??? No thanks. Smart n Final has them for a lower price overall
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when I received the box at least 5 cans were open or had exploded in the box. This is very upsetting because this was to be a present for a coworker.
customer_reviews.author: Mudcats

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting energy drink out there
customer_reviews.text: The Rockstar Boom! flavors of Rockstar energy drinks are probably my favorite flavors out there. They may not have as much caffeine as a can of BANG but boy do they taste good. You may not need 24 of them but once you have one you may end up wanting to stock up. As a big caffeine drinker I recommend at least giving these flavors a shot.
customer_reviews.author: L H

customer_reviews.title: Damaged cans ruin value
customer_reviews.text: Rockstar itself is ok, but the way this product is packed and shipped is totally inadequate. Out of the 24 cans, 5 are damaged to the point I would never select them for purchase in a store. Although not leaking, I find sodas lose their fizz when the can has been dented or deformed. Hopefully the other cans have maintained the quality of the drink inside.
customer_reviews.author: Chris from Iowa

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how I stayed awake before they invented Rockstar
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? I like Rockstar - but the flavour I prefer (mango!) is hard to find, so this flavour is a good compromise. Not only do I like Rockstar, but many times I need it - it gives a nice boost of energy and vitamins that a simple cup of coffee does not. I tried other brands, but Rockstar is the only one that has great flavours - the lemonade or the mango are wonderful - and gives me energy in a pleasant, natural way. No jitters. Plus only 10 calories per can? Can't beat that.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product so that I didn't have to run to the store constantly and the price was good. The delivery was prompt and in perfect condition. I only buy this product when or where on sale. I have gotten this product for $1.00 a can on sale. The usual price is 2 for $3.50. So when I see this on Amazon for a comparative price I buy it. This is nit my favorite flavor. I would say it has a similar taste to Red Bull sugarfree in the silver and blue can. However this product packs a punch with 240 mg caffeine for the 16 oz can
customer_reviews.author: JD Paulus

customer_reviews.title: For this price, it's hard to pass up.
customer_reviews.text: What's better than having a hole 24-pack flat at your disposal? Only paying around $30 for it. I've ordered this twice and both times the flats got to my home undamaged and ready to drink. I'm hoping that Rockstar continues to sell them. I've never drank these things that regularly until now. For the price of these things, it's difficult to pass up.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Stone

customer_reviews.title: Currently my Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This stuff walks a really decent tightrope between the perilous chasms of "way too sweet" and "way too sour." It's tart but not face-puckeringly so, with something remotely resembling an "authentic" orange flavor. You even get a very slight whiff of something you might mistake for actual orange oil—how the chemists pulled that off is a mystery to me. It's not overly sweet, not aggressively fizzy and decently refreshing. If only these things weren't so dang expensive....I really doubt they could possibly cost more than about six cents per can to produce. But if you're going to throw away your money on a case of carbonated nothing, IMO this is definitely some of the better nothing available.
customer_reviews.author: Keflex

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the "BOOM" line of Rockstar energy drinks. A few of my local gas stations stop selling them, but when they were available, I bought them regularly. They have the same amount of caffeine as most energy drinks (160mg per can), but this line would be considered a sweeter energy drink. 66mg per can is too much for me. It dehydrates me, and that amount of sugar is unhealthy for anyone. That being said, I bought it as a novelty item, and the per dollar price tag was well worth it. You can't touch quality energy drinks at $1.45 per can, definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Braczynski

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this and would like to get on subscription monthly. My only problem (except no being able to put on subscription) is 5 of the cans were just about empty, without being opened or pin holed. I will send back to you if you wish. But, I would just like this on monthly subscription (and hopefully with all cans filled) I gave it all fives because if they were all there, that is what I would give. This is just a flaw, and would like not for others to be deterred. GREAT PRODUT!!! and SUGAR FREE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mrs sibby

customer_reviews.title: Liquid Sour Patch
customer_reviews.text: Great sugar free option. Taste doesn't have too much of that artificial sweetener component. The taste is more of a sour watermelon much like that of the Sour Patch Watermelons. It's not as sour as those but it's enough to give you a bit of an extra wake up jolt. My only complaint is how many cans and the packaging show up dented or destroyed. Amazon has always been good at making me whole, but it still takes another day or two which defeats the whole purpose of the prime shipping.
customer_reviews.author: John C S

customer_reviews.title: 12 of the 24 pack of cans damaged & bulging
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when I opened the first can of these Rockstar green apple drinks and it spewed everywhere! I sat the can on the counter and it immediately turned over because of the bulge on the bottom. After taking each can out of the case, I found 11 more cans were bulging or damaged. I'm not sure if you are willing to replace these damaged cans or give me a partial refund, but I'm reluctant to drink them in this condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer North

customer_reviews.title: Whipped Strawberry?
customer_reviews.text: Rockstar has really done something here. Whipped Strawberry is a flavor revolution. But is it a flavor revolution that I really wanted? Truly whipped strawberry taste but still disappoints. Rockstar energy is still twitch inducingly caffeinated and herbally supplemented but the revolutionary flavor is still a far second to traditional strawberry flavored sodas like Faygo Redpop.
customer_reviews.author: Smartphonicus

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this so much! Tastes like Welch's but has no sugar and gives me energy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite drink, hands-down. I love that it isn't as harshly carbonated as many energy drinks, I double-love that it's diet (I don't care to drink my calories if I can help it), and to me it tastes like Welch's grape soda. I love grape SO much. Please never stop making this!!!
customer_reviews.author: H. Killough-Walden

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a hard to find product
customer_reviews.text: I love the smoothness of these and wish I could find the orange boom. Anyway, these are slightly carbonated and reminds me a bit of those milky mystic drinks for some reason, but with light carbonation. It’s cheaper to buy off here for these, plus they sell out at all of the gas stations near me very quickly. They go for 3/$5 on sale or $2.49 each so buying here for $1.33 each is pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Good product but packaged badly.
customer_reviews.text: The drinks themselves are exactly as described - I personally like the taste and drink them for their particularly high caffeine content, but I would also suggest trying an individual can before purchasing. Unfortunately (and I'm not sure if this was a 1-off incident) when my cans arrived they were in the standard plastic plastic and cardboard 24 pack, but the plastic had been stretched over time in shipping, leaving space for the cans to bounce around. This led to a couple of cans cracking and leaking, drenching everything in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Max P.

customer_reviews.title: A staple for all new parents
customer_reviews.text: Do you know all the words to Rammstein‘s albums in both English AND German? Do you think Tailblock Grinds should be performed exclusively on cell phone towers? Do you think Monster is for people that can’t handle caffeine? Do you write your computer code without comments because you’re just that good? Then this drink is for you, my friend.
customer_reviews.author: dasackis

customer_reviews.title: Love Rockstar Zero Carb
customer_reviews.text: Love this energy drink. Tastes great, 0 sugar, 0 carbs, 0 calories, and 0 guilt. Even though I don't feel guilty about eating or drinking anything. It is also much easier on my stomach than Coffee. Been drinking one a day for years and still very healthy. If you are looking for an alternative to coffee or a great tasting energy drink, this is the one to go with.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Just hope they use packing when they ship.
customer_reviews.text: Normally, this product arrives in good condition. It just seem sometimes, maybe when they are in a hurry, they use to large a box and no packing. Amazon could save a lot of money by using a box that fits a case of Energy Drinks. Otherwise this is my favorite RockStar drink. Update: Amazon replace the above shipment and it arrived in good condition. The length and width of the box as perfect but still a lot of space in the top with little packing. I just love this drink and it getting harder and harder to get a the local gas stations.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Product
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't take the time to write a review but I felt it was necessary this time. I have purchased this product multiple times as I love the sugar free Rockstar. I received my package on time, however out of the the 24 cans 8 were damaged like the picture I included. I cant even open up the cans as the tab just pulls right off. This is very frustrating as I paid for 24 drinkable cans and 8 of them have to be thrown away. Please be aware that if you order this product they may come damaged. I'm not sure if Amazon fulfillment or the delivery person is responsible but either way, it is completely unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: It's convenient
customer_reviews.text: With this bad boy delivered to your door step, you have 24 cans of... "I CAN do this." No trips to a convenient store, where you will spend another .50+ per can of liquid gold, and no throwing on pants any earlier in the morning than you have to. It's bold, crisp, sugar free, already made (so it beats the hell out of coffee) flavor delivered to you... like 24 tiny knights in shiny armor. Drink up the savings and drink up the convenience, my good fellows and fellowettes.
customer_reviews.author: randomblame

customer_reviews.title: Great taste anything kick. Amazon packaging has gotten better.
customer_reviews.text: Had a little trouble in the past on shipping of energy drinks with Amazon, but this case was well packed. As for the product, I'm a big fan of this flavor. Top five taste wise of the forty or so different energy drinks and flavors I've tried. Rockstar always has the best energy kick for me outside of Bang and Spike.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda A.

customer_reviews.title: Taste was terrible, flat.
customer_reviews.text: The price was great for this product, cheapest we have found so far. Husbands drinks 1 a day so i thought this would be best to order for the price. Outside box was damaged, the case inside was also damaged. Over half of the individual cans were damaged, some on the top, makeing them harder to open. Husband said they all tasted flat, like they had been thrown around too many times. Definitely will NOT order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the true replacement to Rockstar Super Sours
customer_reviews.text: I was sad when rockstar sour apple was retired until I saw hardcore apple. This tastes even better than before and it's a suitable replacement. Also people shouldn't be rating a product 1 star because they can't read.
customer_reviews.author: Flare

customer_reviews.title: Watch Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased at $26.99 which was a great price, and I was going to switch to this brand from Monster Low Carb, which I've been drinking for 15 years...BUT when I went back to purchase more cases... Price had increased to $46.99... I'm back to buying Monster Low Carb... which is MUCH less expensive... both drinks/brands are very equal... Rockstar is Great, too, except for the price... Maybe IF the seller reconsiders his price, I would switch to Rockstar
customer_reviews.author: NCLREZ

customer_reviews.title: Can't Get Enough--Price is too High Though
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I love the taste, love the fact that you can subscribe, love the boost it gives one. I will say however that the seller's price is too high, given the fact that I can get a Rockstar for $1.00 per can at the local grocery store on most days. Charging upwards of $45 is ridiculous, and I wouldn't buy at that price. But the fact that you can subscribe and get a case makes the price somewhat more tolerable if you have to buy in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: J Mann

customer_reviews.title: This thing is crazy.
customer_reviews.text: I am a heavy coffee drinker. I have tried other energy drinks including the Recovery orange. But this thing messed me up. Its crazy strong for some reason. I was literally shaking after drinking this. If you are getting this make sure you go slow and not down the whole thing in 1 go. I have only had 2 cans so far in two weeks and I am hesitant to have another. Its great drink to have before going to the gym, you wont run short on motivation, but for any type of mental work, look for something less strong.
customer_reviews.author: SuplexCity

customer_reviews.title: The shipper sucks!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the strawberry whipped flavor but the shipper destroyed the package and did not knock on door. On email they said it was handled directly to customer. Very much a lie. Again it looks lime my beverage was tossed around with no care for the product or customer.
customer_reviews.author: David kilmer

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST! I love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: OK, I am a huge addict of energy drinks... I usually go for Monster Ultra Zero because Rockstar Pure Zero is usually more expensive retail. I found it on Amazon for a dollar a can which beats the Monster Ultra Zero price most of the time and it's a nice switch-up from the normal Monster routine. Of note, the dollar store usually has these for $1 a can but they're only the 12oz cans. On Amazon you're getting 16oz for (usually) the same price.. at least it was when I bought it! Anyway, this stuff tastes great and if you like Ultra Zero monster, then you'll like this too.
customer_reviews.author: John Snow

customer_reviews.title: Whatever
customer_reviews.text: We disliked the delivery of the items this is the condition of the case when it should have been in a brand new case wrapped in an unopened plastic so we can store away for easy arrangement in the storage.
customer_reviews.author: Elvie Bagwell

customer_reviews.title: Worth the value
customer_reviews.text: I've bought Rockstar (zero) sugar/calories a few times based of the cost per can. I believe it's about the cheapest name brand energy drink you can find online + in stores. I prefer zero sugar as drinking high fructose beverages is unhealthy and it dehydrates you quickly. If i'm trying to save a buck, I'll buy this one. It's not the worse tasting zero sugar/zero calorie drink.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: All flat drinks
customer_reviews.text: I know this product is lightly carbonated but even after refrigerating for 2 hours it was flat and tasted like syrup. I tried a different one and it had fizz. Most of them are flat. I love the rockstar drinks and being and essential worker working 12 hours a day I really need the boost. I was super dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Bashiib

customer_reviews.title: Best Energy Drink
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite energy drink. I am super picky and these make the cut. They give me energy and I love that they dont have the carbs or sugar that the other energy drinks do.
customer_reviews.author: Jodee T.

customer_reviews.title: Not quite the sour apple but it's still the best floor of any energy drink ever
customer_reviews.text: This flavor is the 2nd best rockstar of all time. The first best was the green sour apple they discontinued and broke my heart. So now this apple has taken its place... Not fully but pretty close. It's great, keeps me going on 12 hour shifts day and night. I LOVE the flavor over any other energy drink. Price is great... It delivers right to my house.. I have 0 complaints. I just hope they keep this flavor or bring back the sour apple cause it was freaking amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Gnat

customer_reviews.title: Great Apple Taste
customer_reviews.text: This tastes kind of like Jolly Rancher sour apple, not quite as sour. Has more real apple taste, very good, very sweet. The sweetest tasting I've tried. Fruit Punch, and Grape also good. I think Rockstar wins the best tasting energy drinks. Probably the most sugar as well, but if taste is your priority, they are good.
customer_reviews.author: GGobblin

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: My husband is addicted to these things Andi can see why after trying these whipped strawberry ones. We were buying them by the case from Casey's and it's cheaper to get them through Amazon and have them delivered right to my door.
customer_reviews.author: HMT

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad Amazon offers these I'll definitely order again mine arrived in perfect condition,ordered a second time these are delicious strawberry flavor I'd definitely recommend if you enjoy regular redbull. I've swayed alot of my coworkers and I tell them Amazon carries em'
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Not a substitute for super sours :/
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would be similar to the infamous super sours green apple but sadly I was mistaken. The drink is alright, not bad, but I can't stand the sucralose flavor. If they had just used regular sugar it would have been fine. Not a substitute for super sours if that is what you are looking for. I wish they would sell it in more places. Only able to find them going on long trips in random gas stations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heck yeah!
customer_reviews.text: It's Rockstar silver ice, and only $30/case. What's not to love?! It's got a nice light crisp taste and the kick I enjoy, and at only $1.25/can. My case came in a day (Prime is awesome, amirite?), and didn't have any of the damage others have complained about.
customer_reviews.author: Tech99

customer_reviews.title: Packed so poorly one can burst
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine itself (generally, I wouldn't have ordered otherwise and I wouldn't have ordered if I could find it anywhere, or even have the freedom to continue looking for it). However, a case was thrown in a box so large it could easily contain 4 cases and for packing there was a bit of paper. The cans came out of the case and one burst. I have no idea if they are flat from all the tossing about during delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Allene

customer_reviews.title: Poor packing - great product, but often comes damaged
customer_reviews.text: To put it simply - 2 out of the 3 times I've bought these, I've received a far too large box with the drinks loose inside and no packing to keep them from being thrown around. They are usually damaged - expect 1-2 cans to be sticky and leaky. But given how difficult these are to find in stores, I keep coming back to buy them. It's a game of chance. (side note - not sure why this review was rejected twice...)
customer_reviews.author: Willow84

customer_reviews.title: Mostly dented with cans unuseable
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure/hoping it will taste good but the packaging for shipping was horrible. 16 of the 24 can tops are bent and dented. Not sure I will be able to Sri k from the cans. Seems like Amazon should have shipping figured out by now.
customer_reviews.author: K C

customer_reviews.title: Shipping with USPS sucks
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this same item multiple times, but this is the first time it was shipped with USPS instead of directly thru Amazon. The box arrived busted, with one whole side ripped open. The flat of Rockstars was busted open as well, with 6 of the cans having dented tops. Luckily, they are for my personal consumption, so I can deal with the dents, but I would be demanding a refund if I had ordered them for anything else. I have second flat of Rockstars ordered that were also shipped with USPS. Hopefully they arrive in better shape. :(
customer_reviews.author: D. Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: Best Grape Flavor! 🤤👀
customer_reviews.text: Rockstar has some great tasting stuff BUT the Pepsi guys around here get their asses handed to them by coke (monster). So because Coke buys all the space in the store the literally have zero back stock. Ok so grape zero....this stuff tastes like Faygo grape or Sunkist grape. So good and zero calories!! I love punch zero too. I paid $24.05 for this case so $1 a can and I didn’t have to go searching for it.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Needs better packaging for heavy 24-can case
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, so I got a 24-pack that came inside a cardboard box several inches larger in all dimensions. Box was misshaped and had burst at the original Amazon tape, then retaped with clear tape. Inside, the shrink-wrapped case looked intact, but upon inspection, 8-9 cans had the bottom 'stuffed' or popped out due to overpressure. Not sure if that was caused by the hot summer, a fall, or what. Returned for good cans so all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Master

customer_reviews.title: my favorite energy boost!
customer_reviews.text: This energy drink is awesome!! I love the taste but it came with damaged cans! none were broken though and it tasted awesome regardless! I subscribed for monthly shipment , then the price was raised by $16 for 24 count. For this my local dollar store sells them for ... you guessed a dollar each. so until the price comes back down i will need to buy local.. but the product is great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shadow Aero Man

customer_reviews.title: Better and cheaper than monster
customer_reviews.text: Good taste yet cheaper and more caffeine than monster. Reminds me of the monster in the all white can. Usually it's maybe 4 bucks cheaper than a case of monster. I usually buy this or the sugar free punched flavor. Never had a problem with damaged product from shipping damage even though the past couple shipments have had no real packing material so if it happens occasionally its not usual by any means!
customer_reviews.author: M. Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest price
customer_reviews.text: I did a price comparison with the local stores. Unless there is an amazing sale on rockstars this is hands down the beat price I have found. It’s my husbands favorite flavor so buying it in a large package made sense. Having it delivered to my house was amazing! I loved just bringing it inside and putting it in the cabinet! Most places I have to buy it one can at a time, it’s time consuming at the store and at home. This was simple and easy. I wish I could subscribe an save so I don’t forget to reorder. The product is great and the convenience is awesome. Add that to saving money and I’m in
customer_reviews.author: Tink

customer_reviews.title: Rockstar Energy Drink Hardcore
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the drink tastes good and provide enough caffeine for my work day. Would buy again if same deal appears again in the future. However, the packaging is bad as a lot of buyers have experience. There is no exception in my case. The plastic wrap looks like it has been cut and 4 out of 24 cans were flying around inside the box. Fortunately, only one has leaked!
customer_reviews.author: FC

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I regularly drink energy drinks and Rockstar Boom Energy - Whipped Strawberry is my favorite flavor of any energy drink on the market. While it does have 66g of sugar, I can’t resist the Whipped Strawberry flavor. With 160mg of caffeine I get a good energy boost without any jittery side effects or crash. I can no longer find this product in stores so I have been ordering the Rockstar Boom Energy - Whipped Strawberry regularly. At $1.34/per can the 24-pack is a pretty good bulk deal.
customer_reviews.author: Brooks Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in PERFECT condition
customer_reviews.text: Case was arrived in a large cardboard box, with NO DAMAGE. Other's have said they have received them with damaged cans, etc, but these were not damaged in shipping. Product is also current, and not expired as others have received. I WILL be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Kuno

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging - smashed cans
customer_reviews.text: Good price, but came with several cans seriously dented or smashed. Poor packaging
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: This....Is the Best of Energy Drinks!
customer_reviews.text: I quit drinking 12 years ago! BUT it got replaced with Diet Rockstar....well, at last I wasn't passing out or having to deal with blacking out, but it is like caffeinated champagne! I have ADD, so good caffeine is a definite plus for focusing. Red Bull and Monster are poor attempts to meet my standards and expectations. And, Diet does taste better than the original. Total big time fan!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Wopp

customer_reviews.title: Amazing flavor and perfect pick me up
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical on purchasing canned drinks online. This is however my absolute favorite energy drink and our area has stopped carrying it. I have purchased it at all the convenience stores in and storing our town ( and a few surrounding ones). Zero calories and zero carbs and a sweet bit not too sweet taste makes this the perfect start to the day. The seller processed my order and delivered it every can perfectly packed and zero debts or dings...and it came early!!!! It was such a nice surprise with cone home to that
customer_reviews.author: Amanda JoLee

customer_reviews.title: Received one bad case out of 4 purchased
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered four cases over the past couple of months. The first 3 were perfectly fine. No major dents or issues. The last case that came though had every single can dented. Worse than that though, was the actual flavor of the drinks. I drink these every single day, so I’m very familiar with the taste. Every single can from this case tasted bad. I have never, in the many years of drinking this flavor of rockstar, had a can that tasted bad. This entire case had a very off-putting flavor, almost how beer can go “skunk”. I’m hoping this issue is limited to the one case that I got, but I’ve been hesitant to repurchase since that incident.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Holsey

customer_reviews.title: It does not give you wings.
customer_reviews.text: It will however make you feel like a rockstar if you have too many. Like when a rockstar binges cocaine for 3 days on a tour. No seriously, consume in moderation, these are not water. Great deal even though I feel like I need to hide a 24 case of these so people dont think i have a problem.... I do.
customer_reviews.author: Bloto

customer_reviews.title: **DISCONTINUED FLAVOR**
customer_reviews.text: I confirmed with Rockstar that they are in fact discontinuing this flavor, luckily we've been able to get it here on Amazon for the time being as it's been pulled from our local stores. It's by far my favorite flavor of energy drink, I'm sad that I won't be able to get it in the near future so I'm savoring what I have.
customer_reviews.author: Mitsu Silverfox

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great energy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price. Better than going to the store and buying 24 individual cans of Rockstar. The energy provided is great - a little more caffeine than other energy drinks, and if you're like me, that is exactly what you need!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Vinal

customer_reviews.title: Love the drink, hate U.P.S
customer_reviews.text: I love these drinks and order them every 2 weeks, I do not love when they are delivered by U.P.S instead of my mail carrier though. All the cans that are not in the plastic and laying on their sides, are dented. Seller and product are great! Carrier...not so much😡
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: Meh it’s ok. Update: significant price increase.
customer_reviews.text: Meh not my first choice of energy drinks. It’s really sweet and very syrupy.......lots of caffeine is a plus and it was cheap so no complaints there......also zero calories so...... Update: they significantly raised their price on these energy drinks so I unsubscribed and went with a cheaper (and what I think is a better tasting energy drink).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer123

customer_reviews.title: Product is great! The packaging Sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Hey they're Rockstar energy drinks, good price, easy to find what else needs to be said about the product. Now the packaging.....I order these once a month they usually ship via Amazon and the packaging is weak at best, but because they are delivered by Amazon they are usually fine. Now the last order was delivered by USPS BIG mistake Amazon the post office beat the hell out of the package causing damage, and 3 leaking cans. ....
customer_reviews.author: Scott Phariss

customer_reviews.title: Packers could do better
customer_reviews.text: I order the case on here for my boyfriend since it's a way better deal than trying to remember to grab a couple while I'm at work. First time I ordered I got it fine. Now the 2nd time I order, some just seemed to have given up on packing. I understand it's a hectic time but why pack a non essential like crap? Shows how you pack essential stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Great Drink, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order from them. They are not expiring anytime soon. Each case is packaged in amazon box with packaging surrounding it. No cans came out of case, no dents, everything was perfect. Thanks for an excellent product that I don't have to carry.
customer_reviews.author: EmeraldFrogy

customer_reviews.title: Just no
customer_reviews.text: THIS BOX CAME SMASHED SOAK IN WET ALL OVER THE PLACE !!!! ALL OVER MY KITCHEN I HAD TO THROW THEM OUT !!!!!!! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY! I WANT A REFUND
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Fave flavor but arrived damaged again
customer_reviews.text: My fave flavor!!!! Unfortunately this is the 2nd time my order was damaged and leaking. The first time they couldn't even expedite the replacement case so I had to wait another week 😕 I'm a caffeine lover so that was an inconvenience
customer_reviews.author: BellaV1983

customer_reviews.title: For when coffee just doesn’t cut it
customer_reviews.text: Do you like The Swedish House Mafia? Do you look danger in the eye and laugh? Do you think Red Bull is just water that comes in an overpriced can? Or... are you a parent with young children? Then this drink is for you, my friend.
customer_reviews.author: dasackis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you are on Atkins
customer_reviews.text: Theses taste amazing! My boyfriend and I are on Atkins, so it's really hard to find "low carb" energy drinks... I like the flavor of them, and they are perfect for people on low carb diets. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great but why the Price Jump
customer_reviews.text: I usually get these daily at the gas stations or occasionally at grocery stores, but due to the quarantine I choose to have them delivered to me in bulk and OMG these taste soooo much fizzier and fresher than the ones I get at any gas station or store I've been to. The box did arrive damaged but all the drinks were unharmed. I rated value for money low because I bought these about month ago at $35.00 for a pack of 24 mandarin orange flavor which was reasonable, but suddenly they've jumped up to $53.48. I probably won't repurchase at this price no matter how good they were.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing, tangy flavor + Great price!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite, everyday Rockstar flavors. Much cheaper than buying at a store. Tastes great and has a solid amount of caffeine. The pack I received was in great condition. Great flavor and the best place to purchase it!
customer_reviews.author: Knut Lovhoiden

customer_reviews.title: No issues!
customer_reviews.text: For all the reviews that received damaged cans. That is obviously a carrier issue, and the luck of the draw! Amazon is great with refunds, so I’m sure for damaged cans a refund would be issued. Mine all arrived in perfect condition! These are my favorite flavor of rockstars!
customer_reviews.author: Tori Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Paramedic Fuel
customer_reviews.text: Sugar Free Rock Star is a great tasting, sweetly acidic way to obtain one's morning caffeine intake. The other supplements play their part in speeding up the brain for another day of doing Paramedic stuff. It is the closest thing to Sappho Juice from the Dune Universe.
customer_reviews.author: GTD

customer_reviews.title: Rockstar is great!  Amazon packaging, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Loose in box. Dented, rippled, bottom popped out so they don’t sit upright cans. But......none exploded, so there’s that.
customer_reviews.author: Krunkle

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite energy drink. It is far more satisfying then Monster and Red Bull. I work all shifts in the ER. It varies constantly. 12 hour shifts. This keeps me going. I am 60 years old with no medical problems. I would not drink this if you have any high blood pressure or heart rhym problems.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Newman

customer_reviews.title: Missing product
customer_reviews.text: Well when I went to open my package there was 1 missing there was sapose to be 24 and I only received 23 I'm not happy about it at all so whoever placed them in the bag and the box without double checking the right amount before shipping it please next time double check how many was put into the bag and box because I spent 38$ on them and when I seen that I was really ticked off about it I'm just saying
customer_reviews.author: Daniell Bramich

customer_reviews.title: Not the best flavor
customer_reviews.text: I’m a huge rockstar drinker and always interested in trying new flavors. This one wasn’t on my favorites list. Tastes a little flat and no strawberry or kiwi taste in it. I’ve liked the others way more. Bummer
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the condition of these cans because lots of people in the comment section received there’s in bad shape but mine were all in good condition. By far the best flavor of any rockstar I have ever had. You save money by paying for the 24 pack here. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Travis E.

customer_reviews.title: Consistently inconsistent!
customer_reviews.text: It’s one one day and another the next. Then it’s gone all together. I wish there was consistency with this product which I drink daily until there’s a pandemic and Amazon can no longer supply it.
customer_reviews.author: James rabbitt

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the monster ultra
customer_reviews.text: Taste is just ok. Might have a little too much caffeine for me. It's not as good as the monster ultra but was about 5 dollars cheaper. I'd probably spend the extra to get monster instead next time.
customer_reviews.author: Mcnosbig

customer_reviews.title: Great value for quantity, price, & sugar free energy drink
customer_reviews.text: Our local store has been out of these for months and it's my husband's favorite energy drink. When I saw these listed for this price and quantity we had to get them. He is so happy to have them and I'm happy with the price we paid
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Thorn

customer_reviews.title: I order a case every month!
customer_reviews.text: The way I received this product is hit or miss sometimes it’s fine yesterday’s shipment was all thrown in a big box with a whole bunch of packing and dented cans. This is not how I expect to receive any shipments do better
customer_reviews.author: Ladybyrd

customer_reviews.title: Rockstar Energy Drink SUGAR-FREE Energy
customer_reviews.text: This review is for Rockstar Energy Drink Sugar-Free (red and gold print) Energy (NOT ZERO). I love this flavor. Tastes just like red bull which is my favorite energy drink. Now I can have my favorite flavor at 1/2 the cost. I will definitely be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Napodano

customer_reviews.title: Helps me feel more awake.
customer_reviews.text: I just need a jolt in the AM to wake me up. Flavor is ok. Drink over ice with added water and a straw. I’m not sure if it really helps with my tiredness or if it is all psychological! I like the size so I can use 1/2 each day.
customer_reviews.author: Swedie

customer_reviews.title: Wide eyed and happy!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, well packaged, and was basically a dollar a can, so I'm happy. Ordered another case of a different flavor for the same price, so I'm looking forward to it arriving tomorrow. 😊👍
customer_reviews.author: BigDog

customer_reviews.title: great flavor, new higher price points loses it stars
customer_reviews.text: great flavor sour apple flavor was an amazing price when it was available which is why it only gets 2 stars . Its no longer available at the price though, so I had to cut my i weekly purchase of this energy drink.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Packing and Deliver
customer_reviews.text: Packing what not what i expect the sodas were all loose inside the box. It looks like someone grab the box with plastic wrap was all rip. when put inside the box all cans were loose. The deliver was great the wraping look good but inside was terrible manage. had two cans damage for the transporting. This was not the drive fault more from the whare house department
customer_reviews.author: Leoncio B. Bertao

customer_reviews.title: Little off
customer_reviews.text: I have been drinking 1 Rockstar 0 carb a day for over 10 years. I alternate buying them between Target and Walmart and will clear the shelf if they have them in stock. I ordered 2 cases (48) of these, both had no damaged cans which was great. All that being said I can taste a difference. These (from amazon) taste diluted, enough so where I won't order them again. The can is also different than the ones you get at an actual store or gas station which makes me question why? I drink 1 a day btw.
customer_reviews.author: Motto413

customer_reviews.title: Love the Apple
customer_reviews.text: I too was disappointed when the previous apple ROCKSTAR was discontinued, but I love the new flavor as well. I buy these by the case because they are a bit harder to find at retailers. I've not had any issues as of yet with damaged cans. I've received shipments 4 different times. The Apple is by far my favorite energy drink on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon74

customer_reviews.title: Best flavor and great bulk price
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite energy drink! The flavor is amazing! Buying in bulk made the price so much cheaper than buying at the store. I have bought several cases now and have been very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Johnson

customer_reviews.title: One of my go-to flavor: Silver Ice
customer_reviews.text: When they're on sale, even better value than Red Bull. Nothing against Red Bull at all. Rockstar Silver Ice has been one of my go-to. I ordered a case since they don't go on sale often at grocery stores. I don't chug one can at once. I don't even drink it often. I usually take half before workout or for a wake up call. Great flavor overall!
customer_reviews.author: Man C.

customer_reviews.title: Did not get advertised product amount
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the correct amount of cans advertised. The cans that did arrive were as advertised, but the amount I paid per actual quantity received made this item overall have less value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always in our pantry.  Good flavor.
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes this and basically one other flavor, so these are a staple in our house. He likes apple beer and he says they are similar abs based on smell, I agree. (I prefer my coffee. )
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hill

customer_reviews.title: if you love grape soda, you'll love these
customer_reviews.text: always love the sugar free rockstars. gotta have my caffeine but gotta watch the sugars as well. if you love grape soda, you'll love these. taste great in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Phong Trinh

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted! I drink daily!
customer_reviews.text: For a few more dollars than my local grocery store - I get them delivered! Yasss! 2nd order. Great buy! My normal, daily addiction!
customer_reviews.author: Norma T

customer_reviews.title: Zero carb.! Great to drink as you try to figure out a healthier way to eat.
customer_reviews.text: Zero carb and it’s an energy drink. I Live a Keto diet. High protein and low carb. This drink is perfect then ur craving something sweet but trying to watch it. I love the taste of this rockstar
customer_reviews.author: curly

customer_reviews.title: "watermelon" flavor
customer_reviews.text: basically kinda watermelon flavor but since it's a mix of "natural" flavoring to make this carbonated drink there is other stuff like maybe pear, apple. like other energy drinks it really wakes u up, lots of covfefe
customer_reviews.author: Slow

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged (11 out on 24 cans)
customer_reviews.text: 11 out of 24 cans were smashed. First time I’ve had an issue receiving a damaged order from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: The Rockstar itself was great and fortunately none of the cans were damaged. However, the case was placed in a very large box with no packing material. Naturally the case broke open and cans were loose and shaken up.
customer_reviews.author: ChefKBM

customer_reviews.title: Bad shipping, watered down, waste.
customer_reviews.text: This is how it arrived minus the 3 cans I took out. They were watered down and tasted not like all the times I've purchased them at the gas station. I drive for Lyft and I frequent these so.. this sucks for me. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Fair Price, Risky Shipping.
customer_reviews.text: SF Rockstar is my favorite energy drink. Amazon has it at a fair price, but every order seems to carry huge delivery risk because the shipping boxes are always oversized, causing opportunity for damage. I've also ordered Monster from Amazon, and those boxes are a perfect fit, so I don't understand why the problem exists...
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Bodian

product_meta.title: Rockstar Zero Carb Energy Drink, 0 sugar 0 calories and 0 carbs, with Caffeine and Taurine, 16 oz cans, 24 Count
product_meta.description: Flavor:Zero CarbRockstar is designed for those who lead active lifestyles—from athletes to ROCKSTARS! Party Like A Rockstar with Rockstar Energy Drink!
feature_bullets: Rockstar energy drink is designed for those who lead active lifestyles—from athletes to ROCKSTARS!
Contains an energy blend of Green Tea, Yerba Mate, B-Vitamins and Taurine, but with 240mg caffeine (50% more than Original Rockstar)
A balanced and revitalizing combination of mixed berry and melon flavors make Zero Carb unique and incredibly tasty

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
